interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy and the second most populous country.
The US has the largest economy in the world.
China is the most populous country and has the Great Wall, the longest wall in the world.
Japan is known for its bullet trains, which can travel at speeds over 300 km/h.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest rainforest on Earth.
Germany is the largest economy in Europe and famous for its engineering and cars.
Australia is the only country that is also a continent.
Canada has more lakes than the rest of the world's lakes combined.
France is the most visited country in the world, attracting over 89 million tourists annually.
South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria, Bloemfontein, and Cape Town.
